project_descr: Modernização Institucional da Secretaria Executiva da Coordenação-Geral de Mudanças Globais de Clima (SE-CIMGC).

outputs.output_descr:
The Interministerial Commission on Global Climate Change (Comisão Interministerial de Mudança Global do Clima - CIMGC) is the Designated National Authority for approval and monitoring of projects for the Clean Development Mechanism (CDM) in the country. This project aims to provide the Executive Secretariat of CIMGC tools and skill necessary for its operations through four specific outcomes:
 i) Establishment of the operating panel of experts for technical evaluation in contributing to sustainable development of CDM projects submitted to CIMGC.
 ii) Establishment of a mechanism for legal advice CIMCG.
 iii) Development of training programs and information management in relation to the CDM.
 iv) Implementation of a program of support to Brazilian institutions and accreditation of designated operational entities of the CDM and the establishment of technical panels.
